pages.name: Mantashark
pages.text: Mantasharks are aquatic hostile creatures found in the Mirrored Sea biome. They attack with opalized projectiles.

pages.name: Opalized Mantashark
pages.text: Opalized mantasharks are aquatic hostile creatures found in the Mirrored Sea biome. They are a rarer variant of the Mantashark.
Mantasharks drop their teeth when killed.
